main event: A Kentucky State Police officer observed a bright, disc-shaped object with reddish/orangish lights around the perimeter pass directly over his police car on January 9, 1964 in Frankfort, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object was an estimated 40-50 feet in diameter and passed about 75-100 feet above the officer's car.
When the object passed over the car, the engine and radio temporarily stopped working, but were immediately restored to normal operation when the object had passed.
The officer reported that the object accelerated at a very rapid rate of speed and disappeared from sight.
The officer stated that the object had no visible wings or other structural members, only a circular or disc-shaped configuration with lights around the perimeter.
A resident in the Frankfort area reported a similar sighting of a bright light approaching and then rapidly accelerating and disappearing on December 31, 1963.
sighted object: a bright, disc-shaped object with reddish/orangish lights around the perimeter
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
